appDesc.message: Free enterprise-grade protection for your personal browser.
appDesc.description: The description of the extension, displayed in the user's browser.

description.message: Free enterprise-grade security for your personal browser.

malicious_sites_detected.description: The text used to show how many malicious URLs are scanned on the dashboard.

popup_title.description: The title used for the popup when the extension icon is pressed.

urls_scanned.description: The text used to show how many URLs are scanned on the dashboard.

unique_urls_scanned.description: The text used to show how many unique URLs are scanned on the dashboard.

warning.description: The text used in the warning banner.

warning_header.description: The text used in the warning banner.

warning_text.message: Close the tab unless you know this site is safe!
warning_text.description: The text used in the warning banner.
